Title: Authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles to establish one or more temporary branch offices within a county
Summary: Authorizes the commissioner of motor vehicles and county clerks, as agents of such commissioner, to establish one or more temporary branch offices within a county; requires the establishment of one or more temporary branch offices within Rockland county for a period of no less than one year, subject to available resources; includes mobile offices within temporary branch offices.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing temporary branch offices
